label: Actuarial Theory II
description: Continuation of MATH 471. Emphasis is on multiple-life functions. 3 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Credit is not given for MATH 472 and MATH 565. Prerequisite: MATH 471.
courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Credit is not given for MATH 472 and MATH 565. Prerequisite: MATH 471.
